sentences.sContent: ...the so-called unbridgeable gap between the world of humans and that of chimpanzees.
sentences.sCn: ...人类社会和黑猩猩社会间所谓的不可逾越的鸿沟。

trans.tranCn: 不能架桥的， 不能逾越的
trans.tranOther: An unbridgeable gap or divide between two sides in an argument is so great that the two sides seem unlikely ever to agree
